title: [Vigil's End, Armistice Avenue]
description: Towering over the broad pathway, an umbrageous oak sunders the cobblestones with eruptions of knotted roots.  A slatted ramp winds around the tree, its handrails ensnared in curling, wayward tendrils of spined vines strangling the enormous trunk.  Trimmed to boxy shapes, blossomed azalea bushes edge the residences lining the road.  Vibrantly painted wood shields trim the wraparound porch of a turreted brick house overlooking the blushed, floriated canopy to the south.
